stories.text:
Every tag company allows you to delete your tech account. Hacker news will not.

I posted last year concerning this issue which received a lot of concern from users.

I posted this year receive more than a dozen points before the post was flagged and removed.

If you are concerned about privacy, copyright and publishing, You should be concerned that you can’t control or delete your contact on this platform.
stories.title: Hacker News will not let you delete comments or account, ever
